Description_lang: Encompasses a target in flames after $221606D, burning them for $221603D. Every second they burn, they explode for $228190s1 damage and an additional $206503s1 Fire damage to friends within $206503A1 yards.Struck targets leave residual embers at their location, exploding again for $221605s1 Fire damage to targets within $221605A1 yards, creating a field of Desolate Ground.
AuraDescription_lang: Exploding for $206503s1 Fire damage every second, creating Destolate Ground.
